About.paragraph: Hello! I’m Marek. I’m a 4th-year engineering student majoring in Computer Science at <underscore>Uniwersytet Merito</underscore>. I develop applications in Python and Node.js, primarily focusing on backend development. However, I aspire to become a full-stack developer in the future ✨

Projects.heading: Projects
Projects.project1-text: A website for e-commerce shopping including ordering and administration tools

Contact.text: Feel free to contact me if you have any questions!
